description: Review competitive analysis recommendations against existing common-repo functionality

context.reason: Some recommended features (version check, dry-run) may already exist in the codebase

steps: Read the recommendations section of competitive-analysis.md
For each recommended feature, search the codebase for existing implementation
Check CLI help output for existing commands/flags
Update the recommendations section to reflect what already exists vs what's new
Add a 'Current State' section documenting existing capabilities
